OOC: ok I'll send my troops.

Attilla/Luzbel::

Attilla and Luzbel appeared behind RazorClaw and Bullet.

"Well, well"said Luzbel "Why are you chatting with the enemy, Bullet? 
Are you betraying us? "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Razor Claw smelled the scent of the gas and set his feet, "get 
close to me,"
> he instructed Bullet, "My shield can protect us from any outside 
force."
> 
> Bullet transformed back to robot mode and stepped close to the 
raptor."Why
> do you suddenly trust me behind you?" the bullish bot asked wary of 
the
> mutants change in attitude.
> 
> "Because," the mutant dino said" My shield protects me from anything
> outside" Razor Claw paused for a moment to lick his lips, "I can 
handle an
> overgrown hamburger."
> 
> OOC Come on Airly, quit with the cheap gadgets and send in the 
troops.
